00039 #include "DifferentialGeometry.h"
00040 #include "TShape.h"
00041 
00042 DifferentialGeometry::DifferentialGeometry()
00043 : u(0.0), v(0.0), pShape(0)
00044 {
00045 
00046 }
00047 
00048 DifferentialGeometry::DifferentialGeometry( const Point3D& P, const Vector3D& DPDU,
00049                         const Vector3D& DPDV, const Vector3D& DNDU,
00050                         const Vector3D& DNDV, double uu, double vv,
00051                         const TShape *sh )
00052 : point(P), u(uu), v(vv), pShape(sh),
00053   dpdu(DPDU), dpdv(DPDV), dndu(DNDU), dndv(DNDV)
00054 {
00055         normal = Normalize( NormalVector( CrossProduct( dpdu, dpdv ) ) );
00056 }
00057 
00058 DifferentialGeometry::~DifferentialGeometry()
00059 {
00060 
00061 }
